------------------------ ENGLISH ---------------------------

if you like it, prefer to buy it at mandriva ( http://www2.mandriva.com/instanton/ ) and help developers to give you the best of linux 

Boot your Linux in less than 10 seconds!*
InstantOn is designed to be installed by itself or to complement an Operating System. 
Access the Web and your data in less than 10 seconds*.


Get faster :
discover how fast and fun the Web can be,
get to your email with Mozilla Thunderbird,
get to your data, locate and remote.


Get to the facts :
Surf on the web without worrying for viruses,
watch your Divx,
have a look at your pictures,
listen to your favorite music.


Mobile :
InstantOn is the ideal fit for netbooks, laptops and MIDs.
Thanks to its Wi-Fi and 3G compatibility (under the condition of compatibility) allied to the network center, it will be the perfect tool while traveling.


Sharing.
You can choose to install InstantOn by itself or to complement an Operating System (like Linux or Microsoft Windows XP, Vista or 7).
Your data can still be available from your InstantOn
